entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
